# vfs_devblocksize

**Function**

Get the block size of the device underlying a mount.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_devblocksize(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount for which to get block size.

## Return Value

Block size.
title: vfs_devblocksize
